testimonials.text_3: A few months ago, you designed my company's business card. You listened carefully and followed instructions, and came up with several logo ideas (you're very imaginative) that we liked enormously. You make a great team.

history.text_5: Our team of passionate, hard-working young talents cultivates strategies every day to stay at the cutting edge of technology.
history.text_7: Guided by passion and competence, we eagerly accept the challenge of making our partners' dreams come true.
